column11: As one of our Principal Data Scientists you drive our scientific roadmap to predict demand returns costs and other key factors for our dynamic pricing system for Zalando s 500K item and can implement it in an elegant stable and scalable way Actively engage in our cutting edge research activity for time series analysis or mixed integer optimization in collaboration with the libraries such as PyTorch pandas scikit learn TensorFlow and big data frameworks such as Spark Industry experience within Dynamic Pricing Perishable Inventory Supply Chain Logistics Retail or the Airline Aviation or Hospitality industry would be desirable Profound understanding of statistics and machine learning from simple regressions to neural networks e g LSTM Transformers and or mathematical optimization with an understanding of using the right approaches Publication record in relevant Machine Learning conferences journals ABOUT ZALANDO Zalando is Europe s leading online platform for fashion connecting customers brands and partners across many European markets We drive digital solutions for fashion logistics advertising and research bringing head to toe fashion to more than millions of active customers through diverse skill sets interests and languages our teams choose to use PRICING PLATFORM TEAMS In Pricing Platform we currently have 9 delivery teams varying in different technical domains such as backend services mathematical optimization machine learning and customer centric services The delivery teams work closely with the commercial and product teams to deliver robust pricing solutions FORECASTING TEAM The Article Sales Forecast ASF team is responsible for developing multiple forecasting models Our models are one of the pillars of Zalando s pricing system During the season every week we forecast sales returns and available stock for more than 400000 articles This forecast is then used within a large scale optimization algorithm to find the optimal prices We apply cutting edge machine learning research in solving our tasks ranging from Transformers to differential programming and probabilistic modeling The team consists of senior research engineers and applied scientists who together build scalable machine learning models which are capable of being called millions of times without sacrificing the complexity of the model which perform inference either at real time or in batch to help satisfy the customers information needs We do this at scale serving tens of thousands requests per second meaning we not only have a large customer mission but also a large operational mission Due to strong growth in 2020 we are embarking on an ambitious mission to build out new personalisation productivity and optimization capabilities in our ranking stack to enhance the Zalando customer experience We need you to be our machine learning analytics engineering expert in a team of applied scientists and software engineers Your mission will be to help level up our machine learning pipelines tooling and serving and raise our general software engineering practices with regards to machine learning in the team WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED Collaborate with our applied scientists and software engineers to build rock solid machine learning and data pipelines which power our product ranking experience for millions of customers every day Support the team by defining best practices around topics related to ETLs data engineering data governance and GDPR Working with team members to increase the velocity of the team by creating productivity tools related to our DataOps DevOps or ML Ops workflows Lead the development of automated analysis and auto machine learning pipelines to help the team scale up their machine learning operations reporting operations and data quality checks With the team breaking down technical requirements and coming up with a project plan and system design to achieve our recommendation search or optimization goals Work with both batch and streaming based data pipelines to move hundreds of gigabytes of data to our different storage systems used for algorithm and product reporting as well as model building Get involved in the operational planning of huge sales events such as cyber week where overnight our systems must scale exponentially to serve the strong customer demand Collaborating with other teams in the search and browse department or advertising systems on cross department projects where you represent the team Attending conferences and sharing best practices or
